name: x-sp-def
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's Special Defense by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Raises Special Defense by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An item that raises the Sp. Def stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.
